Gold prices recovered slightly from a sharp fall earlier this week, but analysts are still pessimistic on the outlook for the precious metal going forward.

articles.author: Sean O'Kane
articles.title: Lordstown Motors pivots to renting space at former GM factory - The Verge
articles.description: Troubled EV startup Lordstown Motors says it wants to loan out space at the former GM factory it occupies as a way to make more money during early days of production of its electric pickup truck. It’s also looking at other funding opportunities, like borrowin…
articles.content:
The troubled electric truck startups interim CEO said it could create significant new revenue opportunities
